mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, m.mission_content AS title, p.content, p.like_count, p.mission_id, p.written_datetime, u.nickname, m.mission_content AS missionContent, DATE_FORMAT(m.mission_date, '%m월 %d일') AS missionDate, mt.theme_name AS priThemeName, st.theme_name AS subThemeName, e.emotion_name AS emotionName, c.companion_type AS companionType FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN THEME mt ON m.pri_theme_id = mt.theme_id LEFT JOIN THEME st ON m.sub_theme_id = st.theme_id LEFT JOIN EMOTION e ON p.emotion_id = e.emotion_id LEFT JOIN COMPANION c ON p.companion_id = c.companion_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON p.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( title, content, like_count, mission_id, written_datetime, companion_id, emotion_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{missionId}, NOW(), (SELECT companion_id FROM COMPANION WHERE companion_type = #{companionType}), (SELECT emotion_id FROM EMOTION WHERE emotion_name = #{emotionName}), #{user_id} )
